description.fr:
{%FightTurnEnded} Confère {PropertyEffect:18} à votre héros jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour s'il a au moins {value:adv}\_{adv,plural,one[adversaire] other[adversaires]} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.<if pvm>
\---
<rem>{PropertyEffect:18} ne réduit pas l'{%AT} de votre héros.</rem></if>
description.en:
{%FightTurnEnded} Confers {PropertyEffect:18} on your hero until the end of their next turn if they have at least {value:adv}\_{adv,plural,one[opponent] other[opponents]} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> them.<if pvm>
\---
<rem>{PropertyEffect:18} does not reduce your hero's {%AT}.</rem></if>
description.es:
{%FightTurnEnded} Confiere {PropertyEffect:18} a tu héroe hasta el final de su próximo turno si tiene al menos {value:adv}\_{adv,plural,one[adversario] other[adversarios]} a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.<if pvm>
\---
<rem>{PropertyEffect:18} no reduce el {%AT} de tu héroe.</rem></if>
description.de:
{%FightTurnEnded} Verleiht deinem Helden bis zum Ende seiner nächsten Runde {PropertyEffect:18}, wenn es mindestens {value:adv}\_{adv,plural,one[Gegner] other[Gegner]} im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> gibt.<if pvm>
\---
<rem>{PropertyEffect:18} verringert den {%AT} deines Helden nicht.</rem></if>
description.pt:
{%FightTurnEnded} Concede {PropertyEffect:18} ao seu herói até o fim de seu próximo turno se ele tiver pelo menos {value:adv}\_{adv,plural,one[adversário] other[adversários]} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.<if pvm>
\---
<rem>{PropertyEffect:18} não reduz o {%AT} do seu herói.</rem></if>

gameplayDescription.fr:
{PropertyEffect:18}\_: Tel un passe-muraille, traversez vos ennemis pour leur infliger des dégâts basés sur votre {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>\_: Votre force brute\_! Plus vous l'améliorerez, plus vous taperez fort\_!
gameplayDescription.en:
{PropertyEffect:18}: As if endowed with the ability to walk through walls, go through your enemies to do damage to them based on your {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: Your raw strength! The more you improve it, the harder you'll hit!
gameplayDescription.es:
{PropertyEffect:18}: Atraviesa a tus enemigos cual fantasma para infligirles daños basados en tu {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: ¡Tu fuerza bruta! Cuanto más lo mejores, ¡más fuerte golpearás!
gameplayDescription.de:
{PropertyEffect:18}: Du überquerst deine Feinde wie eine Abrissbirne und verursachst bei ihnen basierend auf deinem {%at,plural:one} Schaden.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT,plural:one}</color>: Deine rohe Kraft! Je mehr du sie verbesserst, desto stärker schlägst du zu!
gameplayDescription.pt:
{PropertyEffect:18}: Tal qual um fantasma, atravesse seus inimigos para infligir danos com base no seu {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: Quanto mais você aprimorá-lo, mais fortes serão os seus golpes!
